We can make better, more automated R Markdown files by customizing code chunks, figures, cross-references, and citations.

## Learning objectives

* Customized code chunk output
* Control figure size, scale, captions
* Cross-reference figures, tables, and sections
* Insert citations to automatically generate formatted bibliographies

## Pre-meeting

To prepare for this class meeting, please do the following:

* Read [R4DS2 30](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/quarto.html){target='_blank'}
* Consider installing [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) and [Better BibTeX](https://retorque.re/zotero-better-bibtex/) extension (optional)
